title: Remove background music from Propose Day page

requirements.summary: Remove all background music element and related play/pause, mute, volume, and fade-in state/effects/helpers from ProposeDayPage.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/ProposeDayPage.tsx` no longer renders an `<audio>` element (e.g., the one currently using `src="/assets/audio/chaar-kadam-male-portion.mp3"`).

All music-related React state, refs, effects, and helper functions are removed (e.g., `isPlaying`, `volume`, `isMuted`, `audioRef`, `fadeIntervalRef`, `fadeInAudio`, `togglePlay`, `toggleMute`, `handleVolumeChange`).
The page builds without TypeScript/ESLint errors and has no unused imports related to music controls (e.g., `Play`, `Pause`, `Volume2`, `VolumeX`, `Button`, `Slider` if they become unused).

file_operations.description: Delete the `<audio>` element and all audio/mute/volume/fade logic (state, refs, effects, helpers). Clean up imports so only non-music React hooks and icons remain. Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (immutable constraint).

requirements.summary: Remove the fixed on-screen music controls panel (buttons/sliders and related labels) from ProposeDayPage.
acceptanceCriteria: The fixed bottom-right music control panel is no longer rendered.
There is no user-facing text or aria-labels related to music playback (e.g., "Play music", "Pause music", "Mute", "Unmute", "Volume").
The rest of the page layout (hero, teddy bear visual, love letter section, final proposal section, footer, rose decorations) remains present and visually consistent.

file_operations.description: Remove the fixed bottom-right music controls UI markup and any remaining references to music-related aria-labels/text. Ensure the remaining sections (hero/teddy, love letter, final proposal, footer, rose decorations) are unchanged aside from music removal; avoid changes to romantic content and decorative visuals beyond this scope.
